meanings.definition: Of or relating to oxalic acid.
meanings.sent1: The oxalic solution was used to clean the rust off the metal.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the oxalic properties of the acid in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too much oxalic acid to the recipe, making it taste sour.
meanings.sent4: Her words had an oxalic effect on him, leaving a bitter taste in his mouth.
meanings.sent5: The oxalic smell of the acid filled the room, making everyone cough.

meanings.definition: Containing or derived from oxalic acid.
meanings.sent1: The oxalic crystals were carefully analyzed under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The oxalic compound was found in the plant samples collected from the forest.
meanings.sent3: The artist used oxalic pigments to create vibrant colors in the painting.
meanings.sent4: The river water had an oxalic hue due to the presence of the acid.
meanings.sent5: The oxalic taste of the fruit indicated it was not ripe yet.
